subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Gardi molded the Jets’ defensive schemes, working as an assistant coach from 1976 to 1984, before becoming Hofstra’s coach in 1990.
snippet: Gardi molded the Jets’ defensive schemes, working as an assistant coach from 1976 to 1984, before becoming Hofstra’s coach in 1990.
